daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit Fort Kochi and explore the Chinese fishing nets
Dining: Try traditional Kerala cuisine at a local restaurant
Adventure Sports: Go parasailing or jet-skiing in the afternoon
Hiking: Trek to the top of Anamudi peak in the Western Ghats
Museums: Visit the Kerala Museum to learn about the state's history and culture
Nightlife: Explore the nightlife of Kochi, visit bars and clubs
Sightseeing: Take a houseboat cruise on the backwaters of Alleppey
Shopping: Visit the local markets to buy souvenirs and spices
Dining: Enjoy a traditional Kerala sadhya on the houseboat
Adventure Sports: Go kayaking or canoeing in the morning
Hiking: Trek to the Meesapulimala peak for breathtaking views
Nightlife: Return to Kochi and enjoy the nightlife one last time

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: 2-3 hours by flight, 24-30 hours by train
travel_instructions.route_details: By air: Ahmedabad (AMD) to Kochi (COK), Thiruvananthapuram (TRV), or Kozhikode (CCJ). By train: Ahmedabad to Ernakulam (ERS), Thiruvananthapuram (TVC), or Kozhikode (CLT) via major railway stations like Vadodara, Surat, and Mumbai
